metadata.synopsis: As their 30th birthdays approach, three single housemates take stock of their romantic lives. Rambunctious Jasmine (Illeana Douglas) has no desire to settle down despite her parents' constant nagging, while newly pregnant Tanya (Paulina Porizkova) deals with the fallout of her longtime boyfriend's commitment issues and Micki (Julie Warner) has just been dumped by her fiancé. On an impulsive trip to Las Vegas, all three women meet men who could change their minds about love.

reviews: There's nothing special here, but for this sort of thing, this is pretty good.
Vividly conveys the mixed feelings many thirty-year- old women have about love, marriage and self-esteem.
